p: Among the most potent anti-IAV natural product samples, both unripe and ripe pods of T. chebula significantly inhibited IAV replication with IC 50s of 5.8 ± 1.4 and 7.0 ± 1.0 μg/mL, respectively ( Figures 1A,B). Since unripe pods of T. chebula exhibited a CC 50 to MDCK cells of 255.1 ± 1.3 μg/mL, while ripe pods of T. chebula showed no obvious cytotoxicity at a high concentration as 500 μg/mL, it is likely that there is some difference between the compositions of the two natural product sample preparations.
